name: Occupational Hazard
description:
Ludum Dare 43 Game
Play as a group of secret service agents that are protecting a VIP from dangers within a town-hall.

Block projectiles, disarm traps, and get the bombs out of the way! 

Controls and tips: We recommend using the arrow buttons with your right hand for movement, while the left hand controls the other commands. Also use "F" and "G" in order to quickly group up inactive agents.

[1, 2, 3] - Select agent 1, 2, and 3 respectively.(not numpad)

F - Group up inactive agents onto the selected agent

G - Group up inactive agents onto the VIP

Left-shift - Run

Spacebar - Pick up or drop bombs
